recipes.label: Exercise the Mind: Wiser...
recipes.startdescription: Knowledge is a city wall built stone by stone. But what waits in the darkness beyond the walls? Why would we need a fortress, except that we had something to fear?
recipes.description: I have reordered the boundaries of my ignorance.

recipes.label: Exercise the Mind:  Wisest...
recipes.description: I am a savant of secret wisdoms.

recipes.label: Exercise the Mind: A Busier Mind
recipes.startdescription: Now I forget as much as I learn, but I can still gain Reason.
recipes.description: My mind is a paradise of mirrors, in which all things are clear, even those things I might prefer not to see.
